item.description:
The nice Weather is upon us. So let's start the weekend early. Join Party Express at KEYS TO THE CITY @ Cafe Bottega located across the street from the New Haven Green.


DUELING PIANOS and NEW HAVENS BEST RESTURANT AND ENTERTAINMENT EVERY Thursday Friday Saturday 6 pm on.


CT’s ONLY Dueling Piano’s are every Thursday, Friday, and Saturday.

KEYS TO THE CITY DUELING ROCK N ROLL PIANO SHOW Free till 10pm Drink specials all night.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Margaret from Party Express

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Start the weekend early join PartyExpress at Keys to the City @ Caffe Bottega
